title: Costruendo il Futuro delle Mining Pool
description: Mining pool innovativa creata per il mining di criptovalute.

coin_earnings_cards.estimated_tooltip: Il guadagno stimato è calcolato in base alla performance della pool degli ultimi 7 giorni.
coin_earnings_cards.more_description: Stiamo lavorando per lanciare più Pool nel futuro. Resta connesso unendoci alla nostra Discord o Telegram.

mined_coins_section.title: Monete che miniamo
mined_coins_section.description: Flexpool is a Multi-Coin mining pool, which means that you can mine your favorite coins on Flexpool.

eth.title: Riguardo Ethereum
eth.description: Ethereum is a worldwide computer created to power Decentralized Applications known as Smart Contracts.

calculator.title: Income Calculator
calculator.title_tooltip: The Estimated Income is calculated based on the 24-hour average network difficulty and the 24-hour average block reward. This calculation does not include Stale and Invalid shares.

item_1.title: Velocità della luce
item_1.description: We use specialized high-performance server clusters powered by superfast software designed to handle over 100 TH/s.

item_2.title: Semplicemente Meglio
item_2.description: Dimentica le tue brutte esperienze di mining. Flexpool è sostenuta da supporto di alta qualità, e siamo sempre felici di aiutarti!

chia.chia_comming_soon_text: We are getting ready to launch our Chia pool. Stay tuned for more details. Sign up for email updates or join us below to become one of the first Chia miners on Flexpool!

cookie_consent.cookie_consent_text: This website uses cookies to improve the user experience.
